metadata.description: Official 23blocks platform plugins for Claude Code. One plugin per block.

plugins.name: forms-block
plugins.description: 23blocks Forms Block - forms, surveys, appointments, app forms with scoring, magic links, OTP verification

plugins.name: content-block
plugins.description: 23blocks Content Block - posts, series, comments, tags, categories, user identities with social interactions

plugins.name: files-block
plugins.description: 23blocks Files Block - user files, storage, entity files, access control, delegations, AI-enabled querying
